messages.msgSnippet: Yes, well spotted Milt, they have split the first kanji into two, maybe Afu can confirm this, it it like breaking it down into syllables or just an error of
messages.messageBody:
Yes, well spotted Milt, they have split the first kanji into two, maybe Afu can confirm this, it it like breaking it down into syllables or just an error of some kind ?

Rich
Matthew.
watch out for possible mistakes..............
a quick glance at the auction pics already show something wrong with the
kanji translated as " Awataguchi "

milt

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] flash cards ! Sword related..........
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/12/2003 2:42:09 PM Central Standard Time, matthewhoyle@wanadoo.nl writes: Friends & Klub Members...... I came across something quite
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/12/2003 2:42:09 PM Central Standard Time,
matthewhoyle@... writes:
Friends & Klub Members......

I came across something quite brilliant today and ordered a set
immediately...... any novices out there serious about Nihonto should do
the same in my opinion.

We all know how damn hard it is to learn Kanji, so wouldn't it be good
if there was a way to only learn the ones you will actually use ?

Check it out:


http://tinyurl.com/ur2p

Now this is something useful wouldn't you all agree ? Plus you can stick
the set in your pocket and take them to your local token meetings and
use them as a deck of cards to find the ones you need when looking at a
sword....... !

Anyone interested contact Grey Doffin on gdoffin@... ......
He still has a limited number of sets available for $25 / set.

Or ofcourse you could pay more like BBK if you feel like it........
hahahahahahahhaahha. Sorry mate couldn't resist !

Matthew.
watch out for possible mistakes..............
a quick glance at the auction pics already show something wrong with the
kanji translated as " Awataguchi "

milt


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
